title: How to Become a Sniff Master on "the Dog Island"

steps.headline: Go to Dr. Potan's after the "Haunted House" event.
steps.description: A dog name Yi Lu, your first sniff teacher, will be listening.

steps.headline: After the conversation, go to Green Meadows.
steps.description: There is an arch at the top right, go that way until you reach the arch. Go through it.

steps.headline: When you come in, Yi Lu will introduce himself.
steps.description: He'll ask you to find "Ring Fragment 1". It's not too far from the tree. (the small tree, not the baobab).

steps.headline: When you return, give Yi Lu the Ring Fragment.
steps.description: He will tell you about enemies. Sneak up behind the snake closest to the cliff. Bark using the - button, for Wii.

steps.headline: You will now start hunting for herbs.
steps.description: Your first herb will be the Yellow Flower. Between two snakes (near Baobab and Cliff) is the Yellow Flower. Get it and give it to Dr. Potan.

steps.headline: Dr. Potan needs a Blue Flower too.
steps.description: Go back outside and you'll find the victory gang dogs throwing tomatoes at Francis. You bark at them and she wakes up. She'll tell you about their pranks. However, she is too nervous to tell you about the scent of the Blue Flower.

steps.headline: She has heard about a fruit called the Brave Fruit that grows in the Green Meadows.
steps.description: You'll have to go back there again! Sniff around the broken bridge, and you should find it. Give it to Francis.

steps.headline: The Blue Flower is in the Tree Woods, near the path to Zoom Lake.
steps.description: Watch out for the bear and warthog (boar). Go to the bridge in Tree Woods, and go to the left path. You'll find a log. Help Goliath fix the axe.

text: Go to Dr. Potan's after the "Haunted House" event. A dog name Yi Lu, your first sniff teacher, will be listening. After the conversation, go to Green Meadows. There is an arch at the top right, go that way until you reach the arch. Go through it. When you come in, Yi Lu will introduce himself. He'll ask you to find "Ring Fragment 1". It's not too far from the tree. (the small tree, not the baobab). When you return, give Yi Lu the Ring Fragment. He will tell you about enemies. Sneak up behind the snake closest to the cliff. Bark using the - button, for Wii. Return "Ring Fragment 4" to Yi Lu.  You will now start hunting for herbs. Your first herb will be the Yellow Flower. Between two snakes (near Baobab and Cliff) is the Yellow Flower. Get it and give it to Dr. Potan. Dr. Potan needs a Blue Flower too. Go back outside and you'll find the victory gang dogs throwing tomatoes at Francis. You bark at them and she wakes up. She'll tell you about their pranks. However, she is too nervous to tell you about the scent of the Blue Flower. She has heard about a fruit called the Brave Fruit that grows in the Green Meadows. You'll have to go back there again! Sniff around the broken bridge, and you should find it. Give it to Francis. The Blue Flower is in the Tree Woods, near the path to Zoom Lake. Watch out for the bear and warthog (boar). Go to the bridge in Tree Woods, and go to the left path. You'll find a log. Help Goliath fix the axe.
